sourcesContent:
import frontImage from "../Constant/cashOnDelivery/frontImage.png";
import Colors from "../Constant/Colors";
import wishLogo from "../Constant/wishlogo.png"

export default {
  backgroundColor: `${Colors.greybg}`,
  textColor: `${Colors.black2}`,
  frontImage: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/GjW58nRvH3v0MXIcT995E2_F1DknjaPG7dvHC1nLj934L_ApuNAJRGiwTiIRiki7whfYUAmqXCDDYK9Ui1jRREOdUAVzPjGE3vah-BtcGcymZRmmU9kyhC0qVZVYlxKj0UW0gm1QfSuSdHyCemSGkxvbvRQrVz8HyINhc-jyiUIe9R1s4DcWz2_GIir8EsEfvbfqd8Avrmh5lOQiiozOtyI5pWZ2rIf7FbiF5ul9AZul35y6kMfaGcphqWo0FtXn7qUSrxJFsqhXNpU4r3UonvpUJGPlWbRDQhejFgXu17AMT8b7dYM0HSMIqqkMY5B9bEa9hJmGG_JSNUUvlCidyybEHwY12FYgv1Kfw8gUEVS2hfFPW5B9ZKyS6kWc5xAJbw78ydaJBK5ZxNbcXZR87V2tfQFsxP6rqPbRAMQ7V97YbgMnadPv8chimsJiKdYzLDzhbK5gOa9tBlg6rL8fqyyc59tkj2kItiZr2RTKtWeumS2XwHeDekBtyBtfi7wBn7fgQPH-q_gAiraa5oSrO5X3l5vpzMENmYrsZ9q_BuOwGjTcMUWGYORlpz1qEG8hkf1CzMJ4ed0E7ZsHgv1EBy-c6xNDlcadwSlf3OvpuYSmsZJS0KZFLUxV669MtFW4LugRFLzknul3Rk2btLwzxiY7zX4S6C9GXbvpGpoys_hLfgmF5Hbxj9X_Vow1_A=w1284-h1826-no?authuser=0",
  heroImage: "https://source.unsplash.com/1600x900/?mobile,app",
  program: wishLogo,

  projectId: "Redesign Pick up flow",
  projectHightlight: "Increase Pickup Order",
  projectIntro: `The main goal of this design is to increase the pickup order for the Wish local program.
  I iterate the order-pickup flow, making sure the small change I made can have a big impact on the pick-up GMV
  `,
  projectMetrics: [
    "+ Pickup Order", "-DropOff Rate",
  ],
  contributers: [
    {
      name: "Sam Li",

      `

      subTitle: "Control",
      content: `
      However, in the most common case, a product might have different kind of variants in different store, because the each local
      inventory are diverse. So we have a order-pickup flow to this situation.
      `
    },
    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/m-bkKQ54reTTkFgcJ96UHiQZkDT--hy9Y-15q5qtnQlNwRORmjhXahgqvZGe_OkaULcK-Xd4FllBsJhwHbD8tjEVNZucqpeF1hC5Ousac1Ic8kAa_JnwFVEL2kxxs89D0ti1_fprUbkZO3CSkIzQRYRiEbLzLdh6B_MxI_l25YTwbEvl8G81ybUyxqC7Z5xFdxnF4Wdi5wSxHAEZbH1hatt3VC7-rZwjr9_UVDLrgSTqLMwwFFrxfJBr4z88YuHXa1YWgpSShUlYOx_GOx9woUt9NnFlUEj9X-bJH98Uidp51NSJlBwq99fxNNv1x9a0OvyZHJc1Eo-V7vI_AwgGq_mHdCmFwGC23KD1J7hY_oSTZRX-2zzRrzFGmJEIeA8lyE8XXdURmisYbZcworRf5I6jQk_lqLdEBdJvT9Z-mRyX9Eocbkj0os3hb4Qei5_w-qlC1TiRPIz43xOXXfFofBX1UmrTpk0mbVG5sUnKjRbBdy0xW09WfUxEX_cOHkZjp-QJ7UUv9D--9rsxjpYhuVAJ6lsNwToAZ2aNuYMT9-r5UMMmIBo8wg_koCV8HqhU4lKPw_cUctsfgIabE7k48iTKAwxo06bf11B5thZRfIKiicPiLJy8KCkQ_w4xGoxaNLym58Fpfn-PIZ5PBtw5KkVnFWkI2AA1fK7iR3gBnOlj_qnqOaZM6HwEI44aUA=w2732-h1514-no?authuser=0",

      Our Goal is to Increase the pickup order.. The reality is that, our pick up order reduced ... 
      `
    },
    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/m-bkKQ54reTTkFgcJ96UHiQZkDT--hy9Y-15q5qtnQlNwRORmjhXahgqvZGe_OkaULcK-Xd4FllBsJhwHbD8tjEVNZucqpeF1hC5Ousac1Ic8kAa_JnwFVEL2kxxs89D0ti1_fprUbkZO3CSkIzQRYRiEbLzLdh6B_MxI_l25YTwbEvl8G81ybUyxqC7Z5xFdxnF4Wdi5wSxHAEZbH1hatt3VC7-rZwjr9_UVDLrgSTqLMwwFFrxfJBr4z88YuHXa1YWgpSShUlYOx_GOx9woUt9NnFlUEj9X-bJH98Uidp51NSJlBwq99fxNNv1x9a0OvyZHJc1Eo-V7vI_AwgGq_mHdCmFwGC23KD1J7hY_oSTZRX-2zzRrzFGmJEIeA8lyE8XXdURmisYbZcworRf5I6jQk_lqLdEBdJvT9Z-mRyX9Eocbkj0os3hb4Qei5_w-qlC1TiRPIz43xOXXfFofBX1UmrTpk0mbVG5sUnKjRbBdy0xW09WfUxEX_cOHkZjp-QJ7UUv9D--9rsxjpYhuVAJ6lsNwToAZ2aNuYMT9-r5UMMmIBo8wg_koCV8HqhU4lKPw_cUctsfgIabE7k48iTKAwxo06bf11B5thZRfIKiicPiLJy8KCkQ_w4xGoxaNLym58Fpfn-PIZ5PBtw5KkVnFWkI2AA1fK7iR3gBnOlj_qnqOaZM6HwEI44aUA=w2732-h1514-no?authuser=0",
      subTitle: "Impression Analysis",
      content: `
      Our Goal is to Increase the pickup order.. The reality is that, our pick up order reduced ... 
      `
    },
    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/Q1ga2IOlQy_7ZNPt-_UzcBDCwmYWKkQ59deQT5sdJ-08XliB2iXixlrdsWM65pPntPMhRK8tDsxmfUpzTAUlz-wfStAv7m7-wJyP2ET4dNwPWRv3vHo1hRrgTCIFsDrWQv94zGzodS368AzZlkFB-VOzTKQ98IXpcL16C_PcP_0F1k-ncfOEP65RztOZouM8QNrYLMfiU9FjvyTayOqrKrXyUzIgY_2RcKdYN5OgTBlkjJ0pfrlG7aS7ggR5BuqsaZNsA1wMG_ySIHQlS9QspTH1g6fjecsVKZZMQ2qlK7ByFSajVDUaZLd7Pqtd9ogmWU8Xd9HcsVQDnxKb010zhOVvKacwj3hW-jX7vDvD6JHX3DjnlXxf9j6EymSdX6gn6T28Pww4f4WbzsrrvgGBWUawLviFjH3uwPOJOAf0ixve7RisymBdnTs6-jNYGCe94_H7sWp-R_w9P-0EaI1Mfw0nW5zVTeUNXL_BBt9CWewh5l6y6hqazB4GtiasclZU2xaud5b3Cd_RRPPd1LaHHfL1DGkEotsABIxoJ6NyxCbFU0n3ztk4DjfTABWuW9idVIO8Tw-G2vWLzcMgeB4qCz-wpnh_tJhkfEmpRKS0gNq6aznqV8144JQ5-6xvsY2nruah_IufziTu3jG21fIKygOhZqhZ9_iSZP65N4QXz8_EvsKJ-Fjl0Sb62KdJuA=w2732-h1166-no?authuser=0",
      subTitle: "User Dropoff",
      content: `
      The reason of why the GMV drop could from the unpredicted drop-off points in the control flow while it connected to real local inventory data.
       1) The list of variants mislead users to empty page.
       2) The message of the empty page demonstrate a big reject to users.
       3) The "Get it Shipped" is not prominent. we hope
       users can also add the product to cart eventhough the product of variant were not available, 
      `
    },
    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/8VTPCmlJfIqVqzBDREyuv05mNSrOfAjwp6wzE286t5QDYrGCAbihWn1FsPyQb7gWIF5tqAdMmUp1M_3rklFgsJ70YCKXf-Kdlz4-kIvNu2ke-XsF44_i16jaOTbmVRuQTnsFNfcR4L_jG1MNisZeYrvE4YG_H5R1yHvfTr_dY7mDn-kQmSQlH96bnJlX4LUSN4f785uZ3Km_4nucUQDBH4Ed739yHoNuKM01_BjwzSl1l1e8AbPuHqvmD26qSjuZ3cYT2rg8zMpoVwcd1gD0mHTEFb5ucPWXCcTau_pkTlbysP5J4-O27YmHAZqMT6o58jelI4R5y1o9xhbndNpdQPsDDPc6EmLT-g2sTZu-5yMPQgdoz1KFr8IZ5VWNofH36Ov9V7ospj17E8Se8e4bpEWIFK81-xzlnbbwRiJhuG3uyjf1bM34tlO3sEkd0H5A4WuVVUIbb1_p7RWitC5EUWjRBLDk2dHjtAoq4vuqMcFB16IycU05cB_flzmAPUxjKAtGRUY09vpXA5J8wu5nVwUqXTOZza9Mz7l_LmPldTWGuQM4RjsUdretOTDb6yAcC3LF9wsOamP7sYWOjvmVghuPh9EDUjltCzid4ws01-0eVCB9j0uXQISxaajB3BNYH-L4aadb4U82lQoJ3ovukEXEuomoSvRNZlnayKJd61yRH3bF-2EYjeiGRARSoQ=w3054-h1440-no?authuser=0",

    },
    {

      content: "An overview of my design process. I got a task from PM, Sam Li, in which talked about adding a Cash on Delivery (COD) as a new payment method for users in Malaysia. I then scheduled a meeting with Marketing Manager, Brandon, who won this project, and talk more details about business requirements. To better understand what is the current COD experience in SEA, I conducted user study and gained insights from users."
    }
  ]
}
